Name: Bald Eagle
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: If you like tequila and you like your drinks on the sour side, this Margarita-like cocktail is for you.
History: Created in 2001 by Salvatore Calabrese at The Lanesborough Hotel's Library Bar , London for yours truly.
Nutrition: One serving of Bald Eagle contains 174 calories
